creditline: Gift of The Frederick and Margaret L. Weyerhaeuser Foundation
description: silver hot water urn; small clawed feet, square base with scrolling open work, rope banding, owl with crown at front top of base and cover (opposite a crest), egg shaped body, leaf handle attachments, spiraling flame at top center of cover, longstemed spout with ivory 'T' handle
dimension: H.17-1/2 x W.10-3/8 x D.11 in. (overall)
markings: \'R/DS/S\' set in cross pattern and [lion] at side rim of cover; [crowned head], [lion], \'P\' and \'DS/RS\' set in cross pattern inside urn at top of metal tower, heater(?)
title: Hot water urn
